channel.title: Augmented Reality on Boris Rossovsky
channel.description: Recent content in Augmented Reality on Boris Rossovsky

item.title: Augmented Reality: FaucetAR (In Progress)
item.description: Currently in progress. Tasked with creating an augmented reality application, my colleague and I decided to focus on environmentalism and conservation of water and energy. Our app is a mock-up of a future app designed to lower personal impact on the environment while simultaneously saving money.
